record.description: Dancing Lesson. Hostesses at the Sunday afternoon parties in Ida Noyes Hall at the University of Chicago act as dancing instructors for sailors who want to learn the newest steps. Left to right: June Luetz, 7838 Stewart Ave.; George Bucar, seaman 2nd class; Mary Denman, 4451 Lowe Ave., Richard Jorstad, seaman 2nd class; Jean Farrell, 7820 Stewart Ave., Willard Kangos, seaman 2nd class; Aldine Mee, 1500 E. 61st Street; Richard Johnson, seaman 2nd class. Sailors in the background looking on are from the Radio and Signal Schools at the University of Chicago.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
